```{r fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
library(cartographer)
library(historydata)

cartographer() %>% tile_layer(path = "watercolor", label = "Test") %>% points_layer(catholic_dioceses, color = "green", size = 5, label = "Dioceses")

system.file("extdata", "us1853.topojson", package = "cartographer") %>% readChar(., nchars = file.info(.)$size) 
```
